title: Bec du Corbeau
text: The Bec du Corbeau (1,992 m) is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Chablais%20Alps">Chablais Alps</a>, overlooking <a href="Morgins">Morgins</a> in the <a href="Switzerland">Swiss</a> canton of <a href="Valais">Valais</a>. It lies west of <a href="Pointe%20de%20Bellevue">Pointe de Bellevue</a>, on the watershed between the valleys of the <a href="Dranse%20d%27Abondance">Dranse d'Abondance</a> and <a href="Val%20d%27Illiez">Illiez</a>. The <a href="France">French</a> border runs west of the mountain.
